subject: Sales
title: Account-Based Selling
description: A quick win: understand Account-Based Selling.

hook.text: Instead of casting a wide net, a team targets ten dream accounts with surgical precision. Most convert.

buildup.text: Account-based selling treats each target as a market of one. Every single touchpoint is personalized.

discovery.text: ABS aligns sales and marketing around shared target lists. Combined effort multiplies the impact.

twist.text: ABS fails without deep research. Generic outreach to named accounts is just bad spam with a label.

climax.text: Select accounts carefully, research deeply, and personalize every message. Quality always beats volume.

punchline.text: Treat each account as a market of one.

quiz.question: What is the core principle of account-based selling?
options: Treat each target account as a personalized market of one
